trans-unit.source: In particular, MariaDB 10.2 and 10.3 feature native JSON functions. In some cases, it is possible that these native functions can be used. However, mixing native and UDF JSON functions in the same query often does not work because the way they recognize their arguments is different and might even cause a server crash.
trans-unit.target: 尤其是，MariaDB 10.2和10.3具有本机JSON函数。在某些情况下，可能会使用这些本机功能。但是，在同一查询中混合使用本机和UDF JSON函数通常不起作用，因为它们识别参数的方式不同，甚至可能导致服务器崩溃。

trans-unit.source: In particular, on step #5 we'll read the same index page that we've read on step #2, and the page we've read on step #4 will be re-read on step#6. If all pages you're accessing are in the cache (in the buffer pool, if you're using InnoDB, and in the key cache, if you're using MyISAM), this is not a problem. However, if your hit ratio is poor and you're going to hit the disk, it makes sense to sort the lookup keys, like shown in this figure:
trans-unit.target: 特别是在步骤#5上,我们将读取与步骤#2上相同的索引页,步骤#4上读取的页面将在步骤#6上重新读取。如果你访问的所有页面都在缓存中(如果你使用的是InnoDB,则在缓冲池中,如果你使用的是MyISAM,则在密钥缓存中),这不是问题。但是,如果你的命中率很差,而且你要打到磁盘上,那么像这张图所示,对查找键进行排序是很有意义的。

trans-unit.source: In particular, take note of the changes to innodb_strict_mode, sql_mode, binlog_format, binlog_checksum and innodb_checksum_algorithm.

trans-unit.source: In particular, when column definition is left to the Discovery feature, if tables with the same name are present in several schemas and the schema name is not specified, several columns with the same name will be generated. This will make the creation fail with a not very explicit error message.
trans-unit.target: 特别是当列的定义交由Discovery功能来完成时,如果多个模式中存在同名的表,而模式名又没有指定,就会生成多个同名的列。这将使创建失败,并出现一个不是很明确的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: In particular, you should not specify an index for columns not used for joining and above all DO NOT index a joined column if it is not indexed in the remote table. This would cause multiple scans of the remote table to retrieve the joined rows one by one.
trans-unit.target: 特别是,你不应该为不用于加入的列指定索引,最重要的是,如果加入的列在远程表中没有索引,就不要为其指定索引。这将导致对远程表进行多次扫描,以逐一检索加入的行。

trans-unit.source: In practice, having both MariaDB the database server and Maria the storage engine with such similar names proved confusing. To mitigate this, the decision was made to change the name. A Rename Maria contest was held during the first half of 2010 and names were submitted from around the world. Monty picked the name Aria from a short list of finalist. Chris Tooley, who suggested it, received the prize of a Linux-powered System 76 Meerkat NetTop from Monty Program.
trans-unit.target: 在实践中，具有类似名称的数据库服务器MariaDB和存储引擎Maria都令人困惑。为了减轻这种情况，决定更改名称。2010年上半年举行了“重命名玛丽亚”比赛，并从世界各地提交了名字。蒙蒂（Monty）从入围名单中选择了咏叹调（Aria）。提出建议的Chris Tooley 从Monty Program 获得了由Linux驱动的System 76 Meerkat NetTop。

trans-unit.source: In practice, the subquery will be converted only if it has inner=outer equality. Both correlated and uncorrelated subqueries are converted.
trans-unit.target: 在实际操作中,只有当子查询具有inner=outer equal时,才会进行转换。相关和不相关的子查询都会被转换。

trans-unit.source: In principle the subquery materialization strategy is universal, however, due to some technical limitations in the MariaDB server, there are few cases when the server cannot apply this optimization.
trans-unit.target: 原则上子查询物化策略是通用的,但是由于MariaDB服务器的一些技术限制,有少数情况下服务器不能应用这种优化。

trans-unit.source: In releases after MariaDB 5.5, LOAD DATA INFILE is unsafe for statement-based replication.
trans-unit.target: 在之后的版本MariaDB的5.5， LOAD DATA INFILE 是不安全的基于语句的复制。

trans-unit.source: In semisynchronous replication, only after the events have been written to the relay log and flushed does the slave acknowledge receipt of a transaction's events. If the slave does not acknowledge the transaction before a certain amount of time has passed, then a timeout occurs and the master switches to asynchronous replication. This will be reflected in the master's error log with messages like the following:
trans-unit.target: 在半同步复制中，仅在将事件写入中继日志并清除后，从属服务器才确认收到事务事件。如果从属服务器在经过一定时间之前未确认事务，则将发生超时，而主服务器将切换到异步复制。这将反映在主服务器的错误日志中，并显示以下消息：

trans-unit.source: In semisynchronous replication, there are two potential points at which the master can wait for the slave acknowledge the receipt of a transaction's events. These two wait points have different advantages and disadvantages.
trans-unit.target: 在半异步复制中,有两个潜在的点,主站可以等待从站确认收到事务的事件。这两个等待点有不同的优缺点。

trans-unit.source: In sequential test mode, the number of loops to execute before exiting.
trans-unit.target: 在顺序测试模式下,退出前要执行的循环次数。

trans-unit.source: In situations where accurate data from ANALYZE TABLE statements is important, enable the innodb_stats_persistent system variable. Additionally, you can use the innodb_stats_transient_sample_pages system variable to change the number of random dives it performs.
trans-unit.target: 如果重要的数据来自ANALYZE TABLE语句，则启用innodb_stats_persistent系统变量。此外，您可以使用innodb_stats_transient_sample_pages系统变量来更改其执行的随机潜水的次数。

trans-unit.source: In situations where you find yourself using certain Mariabackup options consistently every time you call it, you can set the options in an option file. The --defaults-group option defines what option group Mariabackup reads for its options.
trans-unit.target: 在每次调用时都一致使用某些Mariabackup选项的情况下，可以在选项文件中设置选项。该 --defaults-group 选项可以定义选项组Mariabackup读取其选项。

trans-unit.source: In small bottles
trans-unit.target: 小瓶装

trans-unit.source: In some character sets, not all characters use the same number of bytes. utf8 encodes characters with one to three bytes per character, while utf8mb4 requires one to four bytes per character.
trans-unit.target: 在某些字符集中，并非所有字符都使用相同数量的字节。utf8编码每个字符一到三个字节的字符，而utf8mb4每个字符需要一到四个字节。

trans-unit.source: In some case or some platform, when CONNECT is set up for use with JDBC table types, this causes mysqldump with the option --all-databases to fail.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下或某些平台上，将CONNECT设置为与JDBC表类型一起使用时，这将导致带有--all-databases选项的mysqldump失败。

trans-unit.source: In some case or some platforms, when CONNECT is set up for use with JDBC table types, this causes mysqldump with the --all-databases option to fail.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下或某些平台上，将CONNECT设置为与JDBC表类型一起使用时，这将导致带有--all-databases选项的mysqldump失败。

trans-unit.source: In some cases Galera will refuse to bootstrap a node if it detects that it might not be the most advanced node in the cluster. Galera makes this determination if the node was not the last one in the cluster to be shut down or if the node crashed. In those cases, manual intervention is needed.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,如果Galera检测到一个节点可能不是集群中最先进的节点,Galera会拒绝对其进行引导。如果该节点不是集群中最后一个被关闭的节点,或者该节点崩溃,Galera就会做出这种判断。在这些情况下,需要进行人工干预。

trans-unit.source: In some cases it is optimal to do step 1 (all equals) plus step 2c (ORDER BY).
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,最好是做步骤1(全等)加步骤2c(ORDER BY)。

trans-unit.source: In some cases the optimizer may choose a non-optimal index or it may choose to not use an index at all, even if some index could theoretically be used.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,优化器可能会选择一个非最佳的索引,或者它可能会选择完全不使用索引,即使理论上可以使用一些索引。

trans-unit.source: In some cases you may want to force the use of a temporary table for the result to free up the table/row locks for the used tables as quickly as possible.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,你可能会想强制使用临时表作为结果,以尽快释放使用过的表/行锁。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, Fusion-io devices allow for atomic writes, which allows the server to safely disable the doublewrite buffer.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，Fusion-io设备允许原子写入，这允许服务器安全地禁用doublewrite缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, a MariaDB system might need non-standard policies. It is possible to create these policies from the SELinux audit log using the audit2allow utility. The semanage and semodule utilities will also be needed.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，MariaDB系统可能需要非标准策略。可以使用 audit2allow 实用工具从SELinux审核日志中创建这些策略。该 semanage 的和 semodule 也需要实用程序。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, a statement could produce multiple errors. If this happens, in some cases multiple handlers could have the highest precedence. In such cases, the choice of the handler is indeterminate.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,一个语句可能会产生多个错误。如果发生这种情况,在某些情况下,多个处理程序可能具有最高优先权。在这种情况下,处理程序的选择是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, adding zeroes at the end of a decimal number can increment the precision of the expression where the number is used. For example, PI() by default returns a number with 6 decimal digits. But the PI()+0.0000000000 expression (with 10 zeroes) returns a number with 10 decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，在十进制数字的末尾添加零会增加使用该数字的表达式的精度。例如，默认情况下 PI() 返回一个包含6个十进制数字的数字。但是 PI()+0.0000000000 表达式（带有10个零）将返回带有10个十进制数字的数字。

trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,如果Galera Cluster的自动SST反复失败,那么执行 "手动SST "会很有帮助。请参阅下面的页面,了解如何进行手动SST。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, if Galera Cluster's automatic SSTs repeatedly fail, then it can be helpful to perform a "manual SST". See the following pages on how to do that:
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,如果Galera Cluster的自动SST反复失败,那么执行 "手动SST "会很有帮助。请参阅下面的页面,了解如何进行手动SST。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, it might make sense to only enable specific TLS protocol versions. For example, it would make sense if your organization has to comply with a specific security standard. It would also make sense if a vulnerability is found in a specific TLS protocol version, and you would like to ensure that your server does not use the vulnerable protocol version.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,只启用特定的TLS协议版本可能是有意义的。例如,如果你的组织需要遵守特定的安全标准,那么启用特定的TLS协议版本是有意义的。如果在某个特定的TLS协议版本中发现了漏洞,而你又想确保你的服务器不使用该漏洞的协议版本,这也是有意义的。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, knowledge of the database allows one to compute statistics manually in a more efficient way than ANALYZE does. One can compute the statistics manually and put it into the database.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,对数据库的了解使得人们可以用比ANALYZE更有效的方式手动计算统计数据。人们可以手动计算统计数据并将其放入数据库中。

trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,记得在分隔符字符串中加入一个空格。

trans-unit.source: In some of the scenarios listed above, a thread is only created within a thread group if no new threads have been created for the thread group within the throttling interval. The throttling interval depends on the number of threads that are already in the thread group.
trans-unit.target: 在上面列出的某些方案中，如果在节流间隔内没有为线程组创建新线程，则仅在线程组内创建线程。节流间隔取决于线程组中已经存在的线程数。

trans-unit.source: In some rare cases MariaDB needs to know whether a given table exists, but does not particularly care about this table structure (for example, when executing a DROP TABLE statement). In these cases, the server uses the discover_table_existence() method to find out whether a table with the given name exists in the engine.
trans-unit.target: 在极少数情况下，MariaDB需要知道给定表是否存在，但并不特别在乎此表结构（例如，在执行 DROP TABLE 语句时）。在这些情况下，服务器使用discover_table_existence（）方法来查找引擎中是否存在具有给定名称的表。

In this case, SHOW WARNINGS would return the following:

trans-unit.source: In some very special cases, even if materialization was forced, the optimizer may still revert to the IN-TO-EXISTS strategy if materialization is not applicable. In the cases when materialization requres partial matching (because of the presense of NULL values), there are two subordinate switches that control the two partial matching strategies:
trans-unit.target: 在一些非常特殊的情况下,即使强制进行了物化,如果物化不适用,优化器仍然可以恢复到IN-TO-EXISTS策略。在物化要求部分匹配的情况下(因为存在NULL值),有两个从属开关来控制两个部分匹配策略。

trans-unit.source: In some ways, window functions are similar to aggregate functions in that they perform calculations across a set of rows. However, unlike aggregate functions, the output is not grouped into a single row.
trans-unit.target: 在某些方面，窗口函数类似于聚合函数，因为它们跨一组行执行计算。但是，与聚合函数不同，输出不会分组为单个行。

trans-unit.source: In source distributions, the sample option files are usually found in the support-files directory, and in other distributions, the option files are usually found in the share/mysql directory that is relative to the MariaDB base installation directory.
trans-unit.target: 在源代码发行版中，样本选项文件通常位于 support-files 目录中，而在其他发行版中，选项文件通常位于与MariaDB基本安装目录相关的 share/mysql 目录中。

trans-unit.source: In streaming data from MariaDB Server to ColumnStore for analysis, MaxScale requires that the Servers format the binary log events by each row modified by a statement, rather than by operation. So, when deploying a cluster for HTAP, ensure that the binlog_format system variable on the MariaDB Servers is always set to the ROW value.
trans-unit.target: 在将数据从MariaDB服务器流传输到ColumnStore进行分析时，MaxScale要求服务器通过语句修改的每一行而不是操作来格式化二进制日志事件。因此，在为HTAP部署集群时，请确保MariaDB服务器上的 binlog_format 系统变量始终设置为 ROW 值。

trans-unit.source: In such setups, each active master must be configured with its own distinct replication domain ID, gtid_domain_id. The binlog will then in effect consists of multiple independent streams, one per active master. Within one replication domain, binlog order is always the same on every server. But two different streams can be interleaved differently in different server binlogs.
trans-unit.target: 在这样的设置中，每个活动的主服务器必须配置有其自己独特的复制域ID gtid_domain_id。然后，binlog实际上将由多个独立的流组成，每个活动主流一个。在一个复制域中，binlog顺序在每台服务器上始终相同。但是，两个不同的流可以在不同的服务器binlog中以不同的方式交错。

trans-unit.source: In supported builds, Galera Cluster functionality can be enabled by setting some configuration options that are mentioned below. Galera Cluster functionality is not enabled in a standard MariaDB Server installation unless explicitly enabled with these configuration options.
trans-unit.target: 在支持的构建中,可以通过设置下面提到的一些配置选项来启用Galera Cluster功能。在标准的MariaDB服务器安装中,Galera Cluster功能不会被启用,除非通过这些配置选项明确启用。

trans-unit.source: In that case, one can set @@rocksdb_unsafe_for_binlog=1 and MyRocks will work with SBR. The user is however responsible for making sure their queries are not causing a data skew.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，可以设置 @@rocksdb_unsafe_for_binlog=1 ，MyRocks将与SBR一起使用。但是，用户有责任确保其查询不会引起数据偏斜。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the Condition Pushdown optimization is applicable.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下,适用条件推倒优化。

trans-unit.source: In that case, you will need to add more memory to your server/VM or decrease the value of the innodb_buffer_pool_size variables.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，您将需要向服务器/ VM添加更多内存或减小innodb_buffer_pool_size变量的值。

trans-unit.source: In the "Adjusting your PATH" dialog, choose "Use Git from Windows command prompt", otherwise wrong (mingw64) git and perl will be in your PATH
trans-unit.target: 在 "调整你的PATH "对话框中,选择 "从Windows命令提示符中使用Git",否则你的PATH中会出现错误的(mingw64)git和perl。

trans-unit.source: In the "CloudWatch Logs" section, click "Configure".
trans-unit.target: 在 "CloudWatch日志 "部分,点击 "配置"。

trans-unit.source: In the "Sign-In Credentials" section, click the "Manage MFA Device" button.
trans-unit.target: 在 "登录凭证 "部分,点击 "管理MFA设备 "按钮。

trans-unit.source: In the 1.1 version and later, MariaDB ColumnStore supports a Non-Distributed option for Multi-Node installs. With this option, the user is required to install the MariaDB ColumnStore on all the nodes in the system.
trans-unit.target: 在1.1版本及以后的版本中,MariaDB ColumnStore支持多节点安装的非分布式选项。使用该选项,用户需要在系统中的所有节点上安装MariaDB ColumnStore。

trans-unit.source: In the 1.2.2 and earlier releases, MariaDB ColumnStore Process like PrimProc, ExeMgr, or WriteEngineService can automatically restart due to over allocation of memory. PrimProc and WriteEngineService run on the Performance Module. ExeMgr runs on the User Module.
trans-unit.target: 在1.2.2和更早的版本中,MariaDB ColumnStore进程如PrimProc、ExeMgr或WriteEngineService会因为内存分配过大而自动重启。PrimProc和WriteEngineService运行在性能模块上。ExeMgr运行在用户模块上。

trans-unit.source: In the binary log, each Annotate_rows event precedes the corresponding Table map event or the first of the Table map events, if there are more than one (e.g. in a case of multi-delete or insert delayed).
trans-unit.target: 在二进制日志中，每个 Annotate_rows 事件在相应的Table映射事件或第一个Table映射事件之前（如果存在多个事件）（例如，多次删除或延迟插入）。

trans-unit.source: In the COMPACT row format variable-length columns, such as columns using the VARBINARY, VARCHAR, BLOB and TEXT data types, can be partially stored in overflow pages.
trans-unit.target: 在 COMPACT 行格式的可变长度列中，例如使用 VARBINARY ， VARCHAR ， BLOB 和 TEXT 数据类型的列，可以部分存储在溢出页面中。

trans-unit.source: In the COMPRESSED row format variable-length columns, such as columns using the VARBINARY, VARCHAR, BLOB and TEXT data types, can be completely stored in overflow pages.
trans-unit.target: 在 COMPRESSED 行格式的可变长度列（例如使用 VARBINARY ， VARCHAR ， BLOB 和 TEXT 数据类型的列）可以完全存储在溢出页中。

trans-unit.source: In the DYNAMIC row format variable-length columns, such as columns using the VARBINARY, VARCHAR, BLOB and TEXT data types, can be completely stored in overflow pages.
trans-unit.target: 在 DYNAMIC 行格式的可变长度列中，例如使用 VARBINARY ， VARCHAR ， BLOB 和 TEXT 数据类型的列，可以完全存储在溢出页中。

trans-unit.source: In the REDUNDANT row format variable-length columns, such as columns using the VARBINARY, VARCHAR, BLOB and TEXT data types, can be partially stored in overflow pages.

trans-unit.source: In the above example, the choice produces a better query plan. Without pullout, the query plan with a subquery would read (4079 + 1*4079)=8158 table records. With table pullout, the join plan would read (37 + 37 * 18) = 703 rows. Not all row reads are equal, but generally, reading 10 times fewer table records is faster.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的示例中，选择产生了更好的查询计划。如果没有提取，则带有子查询的查询计划将读取 (4079 + 1*4079)=8158 表记录。使用表提取，连接计划将读取 (37 + 37 * 18) = 703 行。并非所有行读取都是相等的，但是通常，读取少于 10 倍的表记录会更快。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a unique file, inserting new data will be limited but there will be only one open and close to do. However, the size of the table cannot be calculated from the file size because of the eventual unused space in the file. It must be kept in a header containing the maximum number of rows and the current number of valid rows in the table. To achieve this, specify the option Header=n when creating the table. If n=1 the header will be placed at the beginning of the file, if n=2 it will be a separate file with the type ‘.blk’, and if n=3 the header will be place at the end of the file. This last value is provided because batch inserting is sometimes slower when the header is at the beginning of the file. If not specified, the header option will default to 2 for this table type.
trans-unit.target: 对于唯一文件，插入新数据将受到限制，但只有一个打开和关闭操作。但是，由于文件中最终未使用的空间，因此无法根据文件大小来计算表的大小。它必须保留在包含表中最大行数和当前有效行数的标头中。为此，在创建表时指定选项Header = n。如果 n=1 ,则标头将放置在文件的开头；如果 n=2 ,则它将是一个单独的文件，其类型为“ .blk”；如果 n=3 标题将放置在文件的末尾。提供此最后一个值是因为当标头位于文件开头时，批量插入有时会变慢。如果未指定，则此表类型的标头选项将默认为2。

trans-unit.source: In the case of full backups, the files are not point in time consistent, since they were taken at different times. If you try to restore the database without first preparing the data, InnoDB rejects the new data as corrupt. Running Mariabackup with the --prepare command readies the data so you can restore it to MariaDB Server. When working with incremental backups, you need to use the --prepare command and the --incremental-dir option to update the base backup with the deltas from an incremental backup.
trans-unit.target: 在完全备份的情况下，文件的时间点不一致，因为它们是在不同的时间获取的。如果您尝试不先准备数据就还原数据库，则InnoDB拒绝将新数据视为已损坏。使用--prepare 命令运行Mariabackup将 --prepare 好数据，因此您可以将其还原到MariaDB Server。使用增量备份时，需要使用 --prepare 命令和 --incremental-dir 选项来使用增量备份中的增量更新基本备份。

trans-unit.source: In the case of manually encrypted InnoDB tablespaces, (that is, those where the ENCRYPTED table option is set to YES), you must issue an ALTER TABLE statement to decrypt each tablespace before removing the encryption keys. Otherwise, the tablespace remains encrypted and becomes inaccessible without the keys.
trans-unit.target: 对于手动加密的InnoDB表空间（即那些 ENCRYPTED 表选项设置为 YES 的 ALTER TABLE 空间），必须在删除加密密钥之前发出ALTER TABLE语句来解密每个表空间。否则，表空间将保持加密状态，并且没有密钥就无法访问。

trans-unit.source: In the case where the system fails to startup or the MariaDB ColumnStore server (mysqld) fails to startup and its reporting an replication error on Drop Table or View, this could mean that the Binary Logs on the Module, usually a Slave User Module are out of sync with the Database. An example would be when mysqld startups on User Module #2, a slave module, it will go through the Replication bin-logs and run commands to capture up with the Master DB. If it tried to Drop a Table or View that doesn't exist in the Slave Database, it will reported an error and shutdown. This is an indication that the Replication and maybe the Data itself is out-of-sync between the Master and the slave Modules, usually UM1 and UM2. It resolve the issue to where the UM2 slave mysqld will run, the following procedure needs to be execute to get the UMs back in-sync.
trans-unit.target: 在系统无法启动或MariaDB ColumnStore服务器(mysqld)无法启动,并且在Drop Table或View上报告复制错误的情况下,这可能意味着模块上的二进制日志,通常是一个从属用户模块与数据库不同步。一个例子是,当mysqld在用户模块#2(一个从属模块)上启动时,它会通过复制bin-logs和运行命令来捕获主数据库。如果它试图丢弃一个在从属数据库中不存在的表或视图,它将报告一个错误并关闭。这表明复制和数据本身在主模块和从模块之间不同步,通常是UM1和UM2。它解决了UM2从站mysqld运行的问题,需要执行以下过程来让UMs恢复同步。

trans-unit.source: In the current development phase Aria tables created with TRANSACTIONAL=1 are crash safe and atomic but not transactional because changes in Aria tables can't be rolled back with the ROLLBACK command. As we planned to make Aria tables fully transactional, we decided it was better to use the TRANSACTIONAL keyword from the start so so that applications don't need to be changed later.
trans-unit.target: 在当前开发阶段，使用 TRANSACTIONAL=1 创建的Aria表具有崩溃安全性和原子性，但不能进行事务处理，因为无法使用 ROLLBACK 命令回滚Aria表中的更改。当我们计划使Aria表完全具有事务性时，我们决定最好从一开始就使用 TRANSACTIONAL 关键字，这样以后就不需要更改应用程序了。

trans-unit.source: In the default high availability setup #Spider Nodes# produce SQL errors when a backend server is not responding. Per table monitoring can be setup to enable availability in case of unresponsive backends monotoring_bg_kind=1 or monotoring_bg_kind=2. The Monitoring Spider Nodes will be inter-connected with usage of the system table mysql.link_mon_servers to manage network partitioning. Better known as split brain, an even number of Spider Monitor Nodes should be setup to allow a consensus based on the majority. Rather a single separated shared Monitoring Node instance or a minimum set of 3 Spider Nodes. More information can be found here.
trans-unit.target: 在默认的高可用性设置中，后端服务器没有响应时，“蜘蛛节点”会产生SQL错误。可以设置每表监视，以在后端无响应的情况下启用可用性 monotoring_bg_kind=1 或 monotoring_bg_kind=2 。监视蜘蛛节点将与使用系统表 mysql.link_mon_servers 互连以管理网络分区。众所周知的“裂脑”，应设置偶数个“ Spider Monitor Nodes 以允许基于多数的共识。而是一个单独的共享 Monitoring Node 实例或最少3个 Spider Nodes 。在这里可以找到更多信息。

trans-unit.source: In the latter, user-assisted, discovery the engine does not have enough information to discover the table all on its own. But it can discover the table structure if the user provides certain additional information. In this case, an explicit CREATE TABLE statement is still necessary, but it should contain no table structure — only the table name and the table attributes. In MariaDB, the FederatedX storage engine supports this. When creating a table, one only needs to specify the CONNECTION attribute and the table structure — fields and indexes — will be provided automatically by the engine.
trans-unit.target: 在后者的用户辅助发现中，引擎没有足够的信息来独自发现表。但是，如果用户提供某些附加信息，它可以发现表结构。在这种情况下，仍然需要显式的 CREATE TABLE 语句，但该语句不应包含表结构-仅包含表名称和表属性。在MariaDB中，FederatedX存储引擎支持此功能。创建表时，只需指定 CONNECTION 属性，引擎就会自动提供表结构（字段和索引）。

trans-unit.source: In these cases, InnoDB performs the encryption or decryption operation using the server thread for the client connection that executes the statement. This means that you can update encryption on file-per-table tablespaces with an ALTER TABLE statement, even when the innodb_encryption_threads and/or the innodb_rotate_key_age system variables are set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 在这些情况下，InnoDB使用服务器线程对执行该语句的客户端连接执行加密或解密操作。这意味着即使将 innodb_encryption_threads 和/或 innodb_rotate_key_age 系统变量设置为 0 ，也可以使用 ALTER TABLE 语句更新每表文件表空间上的加密。

trans-unit.source: In these true vertical formats, the VEC files are made of all the data of the first column, followed by all the data of the second column etc. All this can be in one physical file or each column data can be in a separate file. In the first case, the option max_rows=m, where m is the estimate of the maximum size (number of rows) of the table, must be specified to be able to insert some new records. This leaves an empty space after each column area in which new data can be inserted. In the second case, the “Split” option can be specified[2] at table creation and each column will be stored in a file named sequentially from the table file name followed by the rank of the column. Inserting new lines can freely augment such a table.
trans-unit.target: 在这些真正的垂直格式中，VEC文件由第一列的所有数据组成，然后由第二列的所有数据等组成。所有这些都可以在一个物理文件中，或者每个列数据可以在单独的文件中。在第一种情况下，必须指定选项max_rows = m，其中m是表的最大大小（行数）的估计值，以便能够插入一些新记录。这将在每个可插入新数据的列区域之后留出空白空间。在第二种情况下，可以在创建表时指定[ Split]选项[ 2 ]，并且每列将存储在一个文件中，该文件从表文件名开始按顺序命名，后跟该列的排名。插入新行可以自由地扩充这样的表格。

trans-unit.source: In this article, we will walk through the configuration of PAM authentication using the pam authentication plugin and user and group mapping with the pam_user_map PAM module. trans-unit.source: In this article, we will walk through the configuration of PAM authentication using the pam authentication plugin and user and group mapping with the pam_user_map PAM module. trans-unit.source: In this example we have added another join condition, which ensures that we only pick the matching row from tableB having the latest fromDate. In this case tableB will contain duplicates of the column B.id, so in order to ensure uniqueness the primary key has to contain the fromDate column as well. In other words the primary key of tableB is (B.id, B.fromDate).
trans-unit.target: 在这个例子中,我们添加了另一个连接条件,确保我们只从具有最新fromDate的tableB中挑选匹配的记录。在这个例子中,tableB会包含B.id列的重复,所以为了保证唯一性,主键也必须包含fromDate列。换句话说,tableB的主键是(B.id,B.fromDate)。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a TINYINT variable, x is declared in the outter block. But in the inner block x is re-declared as a CHAR and an y variable is declared. The inner SELECT shows the "new" value of x, and the value of y. But when x is selected in the outer block, the "old" value is returned. The final SELECT doesn't try to read y, because it doesn't exist in that context.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，在outter块中声明了TINYINT变量 x 。但是在内部块中， x 被重新声明为CHAR，并且声明了 y 变量。内部的SELECT显示 x 的“新”值和 y 的值。但是，当在外部块中选择x时，将返回“旧”值。最终的SELECT不会尝试读取 y ，因为它在该上下文中不存在。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a user serg is already logged into the operating system and has full shell access. He has already authenticated with the operating system and his MariaDB account is configured to use the unix_socket authentication plugin, so he does not need to authenticate again for the database. MariaDB accepts his operating system credentials and allows him to connect. However, any attempt to connect to the database as another operating system user will be denied.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，用户 serg 已经登录到操作系统，并且具有完全的shell访问权限。他已经使用操作系统进行了身份验证，并且他的MariaDB帐户已配置为使用 unix_socket 身份验证插件，因此他无需再次对数据库进行身份验证。MariaDB接受他的操作系统凭据，并允许他进行连接。但是，将拒绝任何以另一个操作系统用户身份连接到数据库的尝试。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a user serg is already logged into the operating system and has full shell access. He has already authenticated with the operating system and his MariaDB account is configured to use the unix_socket authentication plugin, so he does not need to authenticate again for the database. MariaDB accepts his operating system credentials and allows him to connect. However, any attempt to connect to the database as another operating system user will be denied.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，用户 serg 已经登录到操作系统，并且具有完全的shell访问权限。他已经使用操作系统进行了身份验证，并且他的MariaDB帐户已配置为使用 unix_socket 身份验证插件，因此他无需再次对数据库进行身份验证。MariaDB接受他的操作系统凭据，并允许他进行连接。但是，将拒绝任何以另一个操作系统用户身份连接到数据库的尝试。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a user wlad is already logged into the system. Because he has identified himself to the operating system, he does not need to do it again for the database — MariaDB trusts the operating system credentials. However, he cannot connect to the database as another user.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，用户 wlad 已经登录到系统中。因为他已经向操作系统标识了自己，所以他不需要为数据库再次执行此操作— MariaDB信任操作系统凭据。但是，他不能以其他用户身份连接到数据库。

trans-unit.source: In this mode, InnoDB does not hold any table-level locks at all. This is the fastest and most scalable mode, but is not safe for statement-based replication.
trans-unit.target: 在这种模式下，InnoDB根本不持有任何表级锁。这是最快，最可扩展的模式，但是对于基于语句的复制来说并不安全。

trans-unit.source: In this mode, InnoDB holds a table-level lock for all INSERT statements until the statement completes.
trans-unit.target: 在这种模式下，InnoDB将为所有 INSERT 语句保留表级锁，直到该语句完成。

trans-unit.source: In this mode, InnoDB holds a table-level lock for all bulk INSERT statements (such as LOAD DATA or INSERT ... SELECT) until the end of the statement. For simple INSERT statements, no table-level lock is held. Instead, a lightweight mutex is used which scales significantly better. This is the default setting.
trans-unit.target: 在这种模式下，InnoDB会为所有批量INSERT语句（例如LOAD DATA或INSERT ... SELECT）持有一个表级锁，直到语句结束。对于简单的INSERT语句，不持有表级锁。取而代之的是使用轻量级的互斥量，它的伸缩性明显更好。这是默认设置。

trans-unit.source: In this mode, you run cpimport from the individual PM nodes independently, which will import the source file that exists on that PM. Concurrent imports can be executed on every PM for the same table.
trans-unit.target: 在这种模式下,你从各个PM节点独立运行cpimport,将导入该PM上存在的源文件。可以在同一个表的每个PM上执行并发导入。

trans-unit.source: In this mode, you run the cpimport from a central location(either UM or PM). The source data is in already partitioned data files residing on the PMs. Each PM should have the source data file of the same name but containing the partitioned data for the PM
trans-unit.target: 在这种模式下，您可以从中央位置（UM或PM）运行cpimport 。源数据位于PM上已分区的数据文件中。每个PM应具有相同名称的源数据文件，但应包含PM的分区数据

trans-unit.source: In this mode, you run the cpimport from a central location(either UM or PM). The source file is located at this central location and the data from cpimport is distributed across all the PM nodes. If no mode is specified, then this is the default for cpimport mode. The central location where cpimport is being run from could be UM or any one of the PM.
trans-unit.target: 在这种模式下，您可以从中央位置（UM或PM）运行cpimport 。源文件位于此中央位置，并且来自cpimport的数据分布在所有PM节点上。如果未指定任何模式，则这是cpimport模式的默认设置。从中运行cpimport的中央位置可以是UM或任何PM。

trans-unit.source: In this query big can be a huge table having million rows. Having correctly specified the block size as 1 when creating the table, the wrapper just reads the 10 first rows and stops. However, when closing the statement, these MySQL/MariaDB drivers must still retrieve all the rows returned by the query. This is why, the wrapper class when closing the statement also cancels the query to stop that extra reading.
trans-unit.target: 在这个查询中,big可以是一个有百万行的大表。在创建表的时候正确地指定了块大小为1,包装器只是读取了前10行就停止了。但是,当关闭语句时,这些MySQL/MariaDB驱动程序仍然必须检索查询返回的所有行。这就是为什么,包装器类在关闭语句时,也会取消查询,以停止那额外的读取。

In such cases, you will get a Note 1558: "Event execution time is in the past and ON COMPLETION NOT PRESERVE is set. The event was dropped immediately after creation".
trans-unit.target: 在您指定 ON COMPLETION NOT PRESERVE 并为 AT 或 ENDS 子句指定过去的时间戳时，将立即删除该事件。在这种情况下，您将获得注释1558：“事件执行时间已过去，并且已设置ON COMPLETION NOT PRESERVE。事件在创建后立即被删除”。

trans-unit.source: In-Order Parallel Replication
trans-unit.target: 订单式并行复制

trans-unit.source: In-depth material:
trans-unit.target: 深入材料。

trans-unit.source: In-order executes transactions in parallel, but orders the commit step of the transactions to happen in the exact same order as on the master. Transactions are only executed in parallel to the extent that this can be automatically verified to be possible without any conflicts. This means that the use of parallelism is completely transparent to the application.
trans-unit.target: In-order并行执行事务,但命令事务的提交步骤与主程序的顺序完全相同。交易只有在自动验证为可能的情况下才会被并行执行,而不会发生任何冲突。这意味着并行的使用对应用程序是完全透明的。

trans-unit.source: Include Event Scheduler events for the dumped databases in the output.

trans-unit.source: Include triggers for each dumped table in the output. This option is enabled by default; disable it with --skip-triggers.
trans-unit.target: 在输出中包括每个转储表的触发器。默认情况下启用此选项。用 --skip-triggers 禁用它。

trans-unit.source: Include all MariaDB and/or MySQL specific create options in CREATE TABLE statements. Use --skip-create-options to disable.
trans-unit.target: 在 CREATE TABLE 语句中包括所有MariaDB和/或MySQL特定的创建选项。使用 --skip-create-options 禁用。

trans-unit.source: Include stored routines (procedures and functions) for the dumped databases in the output. Use of this option requires the SELECT privilege for the mysql.proc table. The output generated using --routines contains CREATE PROCEDURE and CREATE FUNCTION statements to re-create the routines. However, these statements do not include attributes such as the routine creation and modification timestamps. This means that when the routines are reloaded, they will be created with the timestamps equal to the reload time.
trans-unit.target: 在输出中包括用于转储数据库的存储例程（过程和函数）。使用此选项需要mysql.proc表的 SELECT 特权。使用 --routines 生成的输出包含CREATE PROCEDURE和CREATE FUNCTION语句以重新创建例程。但是，这些语句不包括诸如例程创建和修改时间戳记之类的属性。这意味着在重新加载例程时，将使用等于重新加载时间的时间戳来创建例程。

trans-unit.source: Indeed, because the entire table result is memorized before the query is executed; the returned value would be limited even on a query such as:

trans-unit.source: Indeed, if one runs EXPLAIN EXTENDED; SHOW WARNINGS, they will see that the subquery is gone and it was replaced with a join:
trans-unit.target: 的确,如果运行EXPLAIN EXTENDED;SHOW WARNINGS,就会发现子查询不见了,取而代之的是一个join。

trans-unit.source: Indeed, in SQL two last rows, even if identical, are not equal to each other:
trans-unit.target: 事实上,在SQL中,最后的两行即使完全相同,也是不相等的。

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the JVM library module is not statically linked to the CONNECT plugin. This is to make it possible to use a CONNECT plugin that has been compiled with the JDBC table type on a machine where the Java SDK is not installed. Otherwise, users not interested in the JDBC table type would be obliged to install the Java SDK on their machine to be able to load the CONNECT storage engine.
trans-unit.target: 事实上,JVM库模块与CONNECT插件没有静态链接。这是为了使在没有安装Java SDK的机器上能够使用已经用JDBC表类型编译的CONNECT插件。否则,对JDBC表类型不感兴趣的用户将不得不在其机器上安装Java SDK,以便能够加载CONNECT存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: Index Condition Pushdown is an optimization that is applied for access methods that access table data through indexes: range, ref, eq_ref, ref_or_null, and Batched Key Access.
trans-unit.target: 索引条件下推是一种优化，适用于通过索引访问表数据的访问方法： range ， ref ， eq_ref ， ref_or_null 和Batched Key Access。

trans-unit.source: Index Condition Pushdown optimization
trans-unit.target: 指数条件推倒优化

trans-unit.source: Index Condition Pushdown optimization tries to cut down the number of full record reads by checking whether index records satisfy part of the WHERE condition that can be checked for them:
trans-unit.target: 索引条件推倒优化试图通过检查索引记录是否满足部分WHERE条件来削减完整记录的读取次数,可以对其进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Indexes are automatically reconstructed when the table is created, modified by INSERT, UPDATE or DELETE commands, or when the SEPINDEX option is changed. If you have a lot of changes to do on a table at one moment, you can use table locking to prevent indexes to be reconstructed after each statement. The indexes will be reconstructed when unlocking the table. For instance:
trans-unit.target: 当表被创建,被INSERT、UPDATE或DELETE命令修改,或者改变SEPINDEX选项时,索引会自动重建。如果在某一时刻要对表进行大量的修改,可以使用表锁定来防止在每条语句后重建索引。当解锁表时,索引将被重建。比如说

trans-unit.source: Individual SELECTs can contain their own ORDER BY and LIMIT clauses. In this case, the individual queries need to be wrapped between parentheses. However, this does not affect the order of the UNION, so they only are useful to limit the record read by one SELECT.
trans-unit.target: 单个SELECT可以包含自己的ORDER BY和LIMIT子句。在这种情况下，需要将各个查询括在括号之间。但是，这不会影响UNION的顺序，因此它们仅用于限制一个SELECT读取的记录。

trans-unit.source: Individual SELECTs cannot be written INTO DUMPFILE or INTO OUTFILE. If the last SELECT statement specifies INTO DUMPFILE or INTO OUTFILE, the entire result of the UNION will be written. Placing the clause after any other SELECT will result in a syntax error.
trans-unit.target: 不能将单个SELECT写入INTO DUMPFILE或INTO OUTFILE中。如果最后一个SELECT语句指定INTO DUMPFILE或INTO OUTFILE，则将写入UNION的整个结果。将子句放在任何其他SELECT之后将导致语法错误。

trans-unit.source: Information about a range of parititions for a given column can be retrieved using the calShowPartitionsByValue stored procedure. This procedure takes either four or five mandatory parameters: [database_name], table_name, column_name, start_value, and end_value. If four parameters are provided the current database is assumed. Only casual partition column types (INTEGER, DECIMAL, DATE, DATETIME, CHAR up to 8 bytes and VARCHAR up to 7 bytes) are supported for this function.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用calShowPartitionsByValue存储过程来检索有关给定列的范围的信息。此过程采用四个或五个强制性参数：[ database_name ]，table_name，column_name，start_value和end_value。如果提供了四个参数，则假定为当前数据库。此功能仅支持临时分区列类型（INTEGER，DECIMAL，DATE，DATETIME，最多8个字节的CHAR和最多7个字节的VARCHAR）。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB
trans-unit.target: InnoDB

trans-unit.source: InnoDB "clusters" the PRIMARY KEY with the data. Hence, given the value of the PK ("PRIMARY KEY"), after drilling down the BTree to find the index entry, you have all the columns of the row when you get there. A "secondary key" (any UNIQUE or INDEX other than the PK) in InnoDB first drills down the BTree for the secondary index, where it finds a copy of the PK. Then it drills down the PK to find the row.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB将PRIMARY KEY与数据进行 "聚类"。因此,给定PK("PRIMARY KEY")的值,在钻到BTree中找到索引条目后,到了那里就有了该行的所有列。InnoDB中的 "secondary key"(除PK之外的任何UNIQUE或INDEX),首先会向下钻取BTree中的二级索引,在那里找到PK的副本。然后再钻到PK中去找行。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB achieves this by (almost) supporting SERIALIZABLE transactional isolation level. It does so by supporting "Gap Locks". MyRocks doesn't support SERIALIZABLE isolation, and it doesn't support gap locks.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB通过（几乎）支持 SERIALIZABLE 事务隔离级别来实现这一目标。它通过支持“间隙锁”来实现。MyRocks不支持 SERIALIZABLE 隔离，并且不支持间隙锁定。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB also permits table locking, and to allow locking at both table and row level to co-exist gracefully, a series of locks called intention locks exist.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB还允许表锁定，并允许表和行级别的锁定优雅地共存，存在一系列称为意图锁的锁。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB and XtraDB
trans-unit.target: InnoDB和XtraDB

trans-unit.source: InnoDB and XtraDB data scrubbing was introduced in MariaDB 10.1.3.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1.3中引入了InnoDB和XtraDB数据清理。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB and XtraDB do not permit manual encryption changes to tables in the system tablespace using ALTER TABLE. Encryption of the system tablespace can only be configured by setting the value of the innodb_encrypt_tables system variable. This means that when you want to encrypt or decrypt the system tablespace, you must also set a non-zero value for the innodb_encryption_threads system variable, and you must also set the innodb_system_rotate_key_age system variable to 1 to ensure that the system tablespace is properly encrypted or decrypted by the background threads. See MDEV-14398 for more information.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB和XtraDB不允许使用 ALTER TABLE 对系统表空间中的表进行手动加密更改。只能通过设置 innodb_encrypt_tables 系统变量的值来配置系统表空间的加密。这意味着，当您要加密或解密系统表空间时，还必须为 innodb_encryption_threads 系统变量设置一个非零值，并且还必须将 innodb_system_rotate_key_age 系统变量设置为 1 以确保系统表空间已正确加密或由后台线程解密。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-14398。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB and XtraDB perform some encryption and decryption operations with ba...
trans-unit.target: InnoDB和XtraDB在执行一些加密和解密操作时,都会用巴...

trans-unit.source: InnoDB and XtraDB perform some encryption and decryption operations with background encryption threads. The innodb_encryption_threads system variable controls the number of threads that the storage engine uses for encryption-related background operations, including encrypting and decrypting pages after key rotations or configuration changes, and scrubbing data to permanently delete it.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB和XtraDB使用后台加密线程执行一些加密和解密操作。所述 innodb_encryption_threads 系统变量控制线程的数目，存储引擎使用用于加密相关的后台操作，其中包括加密和解密的密钥的旋转或配置改变后的页面，和擦洗数据永久删除它。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB data files after instant ALTER TABLE ... ADD COLUMN cannot be imported to older versions of MariaDB or MySQL without first being rebuilt.
trans-unit.target: 立即 ALTER TABLE ... ADD COLUMN 之后的InnoDB数据文件必须先重建才能导入到旧版本的MariaDB或MySQL。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB defaults to allocating 12M to the ibdata1 file for the system tablespace. While this is sufficient for most use cases, it may not be for all. You may find after using MariaDB for a while that the allocation is too small for the system tablespace or it grows too large for your disk. Fortunately, you can adjust this size as need later.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB缺省将12M分配给系统表空间的 ibdata1 文件。尽管这对于大多数用例已足够，但可能并非全部。在使用MariaDB一段时间后，您可能会发现分配对于系统表空间而言太小，或者对于磁盘而言它变得太大。幸运的是，您以后可以根据需要调整此大小。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support adding a FULLTEXT index to a table with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也没有支持添加 FULLTEXT 索引的表 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support adding a SPATIAL index to a table with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也没有支持添加 SPATIAL 索引表与 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support adding a plain index to a table with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也不会支持增加普通索引的表 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support adding a primary key to a table with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也没有支持添加主键的表 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support adding a primary key to a table with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也没有支持添加一个主键的表 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support adding foreign key constraints to a table with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也没有支持添加外键约束的表 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support changing a table's row format with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也不会支持修改表的行格式与 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support changing a table's row format with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也不会支持修改表的行格式与 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support changing a table's PAGE_COMPRESSED value from 1 to 0 with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也没有支持更改表的 PAGE_COMPRESSED 从值 1 到 0 与 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support changing a table's KEY_BLOCK_SIZE with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也没有支持更改表的 KEY_BLOCK_SIZE 与 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support changing a table's KEY_BLOCK_SIZE with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也没有支持更改表的 KEY_BLOCK_SIZE 与 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support dropping system versioning from a table with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也不会支持下探系统版本从表 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support dropping system versioning from a table with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也不会支持下探系统版本从表 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support dropping a primary key with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE in most cases.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也不会支持丢弃与主键 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 在大多数情况下。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support dropping a primary key with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也不会支持丢弃与主键 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support dropping a primary key with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也不会支持丢弃与主键 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support forcing a table rebuild with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也没有支持强制表重建与 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support forcing a table rebuild with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也没有支持强制表重建与 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support modifying a column to not allow NULL values with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也不会支持修改一列没有允许 NULL 与数值 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support modifying a column to not allow NULL values with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也不会支持修改一列没有允许 NULL 与数值 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support modifying a column's data type with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE in most cases. There are some exceptions:
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也不会支持修改与列的数据类型 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 在大多数情况下。有一些例外：

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support modifying a column's data type with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT in most cases. There are some exceptions:
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也不会支持修改与列的数据类型 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 在大多数情况下。有一些例外：

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support modifying a column's data type with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in most cases. There are a few exceptions in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也不会支持修改与列的数据类型 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 在大多数情况下。在该操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT 的情况下，有一些例外情况。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support optimizing a table with with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也没有支持优化表与 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not support optimizing a table with with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的也没有支持优化表与 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does all its caching in a the buffer pool, whose size is controlled by innodb_buffer_pool_size. By default it contains 16KB data and index blocks from the open tables (see innodb_page_size), plus some maintenance overhead.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB在缓冲池中进行所有缓存，缓冲池的大小由innodb_buffer_pool_size控制。默认情况下，它包含来自打开表的16KB数据和索引块（请参阅innodb_page_size），以及一些维护开销。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not currently have an easy way to check all existing tables to determine which tables have this problem. See MDEV-20400 for more information.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB当前没有一种简便的方法来检查所有现有表以确定哪些表存在此问题。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-20400。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not currently have an easy way to check which existing tables have this problem. See MDEV-20400 for more information.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB当前没有一种简单的方法来检查哪些现有表存在此问题。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-20400。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does not use a sort buffer.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB不使用排序缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB does supports adding foreign key constraints to a table with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY. In order to add a new foreign key constraint to a table with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY, the foreign_key_checks system variable needs to be set to OFF. If it is set to ON, then ALGORITHM=COPY is required.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB确实支持将外键约束添加到 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的表。为了向 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的表添加新的外键约束，需要将 foreign_key_checks 系统变量设置为 OFF 。如果将其设置为 ON ，则需要 ALGORITHM=COPY 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB encrypts the Redo Log using the encryption key with the ID 1.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB 使用ID为 1 的加密密钥对重做日志进行加密。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB encrypts the temporary tablespace using the encryption key with the ID 1.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB 使用ID为 1 的加密密钥对临时表空间进行加密。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB file-per-table tablespaces
trans-unit.target: InnoDB每表的文件表空间。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB file-per-table tablespaces can use different row formats. A specific row format can be specified when creating a table either by setting the ROW_FORMAT table option or by the setting the innodb_default_row_format system variable. See Setting a Table's Row Format for more information on how to set an InnoDB table's row format.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB每表文件表空间可以使用不同的行格式。通过设置 ROW_FORMAT 表选项或设置 innodb_default_row_format 系统变量，可以在创建表时指定特定的行格式。有关如何设置InnoDB表的行格式的更多信息，请参见设置表的行格式。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB file-per-table tablespaces: what they are, where they're located, ho...
trans-unit.target: InnoDB每表文件表空间:它们是什么,它们在哪里,如何...

trans-unit.source: InnoDB foreign key information.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB外键信息。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB fulltext information.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB全文信息。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB fulltext metadata.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB全文元数据。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB has essentially no need for CHECK, OPTIMIZE, or ANALYZE. Remove them from your maintenance scripts. (No real harm if you keep them.)
trans-unit.target: InnoDB基本上不需要CHECK、OPTIMIZE或ANALYZE。从你的维护脚本中删除它们。(如果你保留它们,也没有什么实际的危害。)

trans-unit.source: InnoDB has the following table-specific limitations.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB有以下特定表的限制。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB has to write the undo information to its transaction logs; this significantly increases the I/O required.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB必须将撤销信息写入其事务日志;这大大增加了所需的I/O。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB holepunch compression vs the filesystem in MariaDB 10.1
trans-unit.target: InnoDB holepunch压缩与MariaDB 10.1中的文件系统的对比。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB index information.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB索引信息。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB is better than MyISAM because of way the two keys are structured.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB比MyISAM好,因为两个键的结构方式。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB is block-structured, organized in a BTree on the PRIMARY KEY. An isolated deleted row leaves a block less full. A lot of deleted rows can lead to coalescing of adjacent blocks. (Blocks are normally 16KB - see innodb_page_size.)
trans-unit.target: InnoDB是块结构的，在PRIMARY KEY上的BTree中组织。孤立的已删除行使一个块不太完整。大量删除的行可能导致相邻块的合并。（块通常为16KB-请参见innodb_page_size。）

trans-unit.source: InnoDB is in read only mode.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB处于只读模式。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB lock information.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB锁信息。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB might use new file formats in the future. Each format will have an identifier from 0 to 25, and a name. The names have already been decided, and are animal names listed in an alphabetical order: Antelope, Barracuda, Cheetah, Dragon, Elk, Fox, Gazelle, Hornet, Impala, Jaguar, Kangaroo, Leopard, Moose, Nautilus, Ocelot, Porpoise, Quail, Rabbit, Shark, Tiger, Urchin, Viper, Whale, Xenops, Yak and Zebra.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB在未来可能会使用新的文件格式。每种格式将有一个从0到25的标识符和一个名称。这些名字已经确定,是按字母顺序排列的动物名称。羚羊、梭子鱼、猎豹、龙、麋鹿、狐狸、瞪羚、大黄蜂、羚羊、美洲虎、袋鼠、豹子、驼鹿、鹦鹉螺、羚羊、江豚、鹌鹑、兔子、鲨鱼、老虎、乌鸡、毒蛇、鲸鱼、狐狸、牦牛和斑马。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB only
trans-unit.target: 只有InnoDB

trans-unit.source: InnoDB only considers using overflow pages if the table's row size is greater than half of innodb_page_size. If the row size is greater than this, then InnoDB chooses variable-length columns to be stored on overflow pages until the row size is less than half of innodb_page_size.
trans-unit.target: 如果表的行大小大于 innodb_page_size 的一半，则InnoDB仅考虑使用溢出页。如果行大小大于此大小，则InnoDB选择可变长度列存储在溢出页面上，直到行大小小于 innodb_page_size 的一半为止。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB only, always have PK.
trans-unit.target: 只有InnoDB,总是有PK。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB only: innodb_buffer_pool_size=0 = 70% of RAM. If you have lots of RAM and are using 5.5 (or later), then consider having multiple pools. Recommend 1-16 innodb_buffer_pool_instances, such that each one is no smaller than 1GB. (Sorry, no metric on how much this will help; probably not a lot.)
trans-unit.target: 仅InnoDB：innodb_buffer_pool_size = 0 = RAM的70％。如果您有大量RAM，并且正在使用5.5（或更高版本），请考虑使用多个池。推荐1-16 innodb_buffer_pool_instances，使每个不小于1GB。（对不起，没有度量标准可以帮助多少；可能没有很多。）

trans-unit.source: InnoDB or XtraDB is normally the default storage engine with MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB或XtraDB通常是MariaDB的默认存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page cleaner threads flush dirty pages from the InnoDB buffer pool. These dirty pages are flushed using a least-recently used (LRU) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面清理器线程从InnoDB缓冲池中刷新脏页面。使用最近最少使用（LRU）算法刷新这些脏页。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression can be enabled for individual tables by setting the PAGE_COMPRESSED table option to 1. For example:
trans-unit.target: 通过将 PAGE_COMPRESSED 表选项设置为 1 ,可以为单个表启用InnoDB页面压缩。例如：

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression can be monitored by querying the following status variables with SHOW GLOBAL STATUS:
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 SHOW GLOBAL STATUS 查询以下状态变量，可以监视InnoDB页面压缩：

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression can be used on any storage device and any file system.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面压缩可以在任何存储设备和任何文件系统上使用。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression can encounter compression failures.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面压缩会遇到压缩失败。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression is a modern way to compress your InnoDB tables. It is similar to InnoDB's COMPRESSED row format, but it has many advantages. Some of the differences are:
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面压缩是一种压缩InnoDB表的现代方法。它类似于InnoDB的 COMPRESSED 行格式，但具有许多优点。一些区别是：

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression is also only supported if the InnoDB table is in a file per-table tablespace. Therefore, the innodb_file_per_table system variable must be set to ON to use InnoDB page compression.
trans-unit.target: 仅当InnoDB表位于每个表的文件表空间中时，才支持InnoDB页面压缩。因此，必须将 innodb_file_per_table 系统变量设置为 ON 才能使用InnoDB页面压缩。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression is also only supported if the InnoDB table's row format is COMPACT or DYNAMIC.
trans-unit.target: 仅当InnoDB表的行格式为 COMPACT 或 DYNAMIC 时,才支持InnoDB页面压缩。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression is most beneficial on solid state drives (SSDs) and other flash storage. See Optimized for Flash Storage for more information.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面压缩在固态驱动器（SSD）和其他闪存中最有用。有关更多信息，请参见针对闪存存储进行优化。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression is most efficient on file systems that support sparse files. See Saving Storage Space with Sparse Files for more information.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面压缩在支持稀疏文件的文件系统上最有效。有关更多信息，请参见使用稀疏文件节省存储空间。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression is not enabled by default. However, InnoDB page compression can be enabled for just individual InnoDB tables or it can be enabled for all new InnoDB tables by default.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面压缩在默认情况下是不启用的,但是InnoDB页面压缩可以只对单个InnoDB表启用,也可以对所有新的InnoDB表默认启用。然而,InnoDB页面压缩可以只为单个InnoDB表启用,或者默认为所有新的InnoDB表启用。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression is only supported if the InnoDB table uses the Barracudafile format.Therefore, in MariaDB 10.1 and before, the innodb_file_format system variable must be set to Barracuda to use InnoDB page compression.
trans-unit.target: 仅当InnoDB表使用 Barracuda 文件格式时才支持InnoDB页面压缩。因此，在MariaDB 10.1和 innodb_file_format 必须将innodb_file_format系统变量设置为 Barracuda 才能使用InnoDB页面压缩。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression performs best when your storage device and file system support atomic writes, since that allows the InnoDB doublewrite buffer to be disabled. See Atomic Write Support for more information.
trans-unit.target: 当您的存储设备和文件系统支持原子写入时，InnoDB页面压缩性能最佳，因为这可以禁用InnoDB双重写入缓冲区。有关更多信息，请参见原子写支持。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression provides a way to compress InnoDB tables.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面压缩提供了一种压缩InnoDB表的方法。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression was designed to be optimized on solid state drives (SSDs) and other flash storage.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面压缩被设计为在固态硬盘(SSD)和其他闪存上进行优化。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression was developed by collaborating with Fusion-io. Special thanks especially to Dhananjoy Das and Torben Mathiasen.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面压缩是通过与Fusion-io协作开发的。特别感谢Dhananjoy Das和Torben Mathiasen。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression was originally developed by collaborating with Fusion-io. As a consequence, it was originally designed to work best on FusionIO devices using NVMFS. Fusion-io has since been acquired by Western Digital, and they have decided not to continue supporting NVMFS.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面压缩最初是通过与Fusion-io合作开发的。因此，它最初被设计为在使用NVMFS的FusionIO设备上最佳工作。此后，Fusion-io被Western Digital收购，他们决定不再继续支持NVMFS。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression works without any issues on hard disk drives (HDDs). However, since its compression relies on the use of sparse files, the data may be somewhat fragmented on disk. This fragmentation may hurt performance on HDDs, since they handle random reads and writes much more slowly than flash storage.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面压缩在硬盘驱动器(HDD)上工作没有任何问题。然而,由于其压缩依赖于使用稀疏文件,数据在磁盘上可能会有些碎片化。这种碎片化可能会损害HDD上的性能,因为HDD处理随机读写的速度比闪存慢得多。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression's failure threshold can be configured. If InnoDB encounters more compression failures than the failure threshold, then it pads pages with zeroed out bytes before attempting to compress them as a way to reduce failures. If the failure rate stays above the failure threshold, then InnoDB pads pages with more zeroed out bytes in 128 byte increments.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面压缩的失败阈值是可以配置的。如果InnoDB遇到的压缩失败次数超过失败阈值,那么它就会在尝试压缩之前用归零的字节来填充页面,以此来减少失败次数。如果失败率一直高于失败阈值,那么InnoDB就会以128字节的增量将更多的归零字节的页面垫起来。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression's maximum padding can also be configured.
trans-unit.target: 还可以配置InnoDB页面压缩的最大padding。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB page compression, which is more sophisticated than the COMPRESSED row format.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面压缩,比compressed行格式更复杂。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB pages contain log sequence numbers, or LSN's. Whenever you modify a row on any InnoDB table on the database, the storage engine increments this number. When performing an incremental backup, Mariabackup checks the most recent LSN for the backup against the LSN's contained in the database. It then updates any of the backup files that have fallen behind.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB页面包含日志序列号,或LSN。每当您修改数据库上任何InnoDB表的一行时,存储引擎都会递增这个编号。当执行增量备份时,Mariabackup会根据数据库中包含的LSN检查最近的LSN。然后它更新任何落后的备份文件。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB performance metrics.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB性能指标。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB persistent statistics are stored on disk, leading to more consistent query plans.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的持久性统计数据存储在磁盘上,从而使查询计划更加一致。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB presently supports one FULLTEXT index creation at a time
trans-unit.target: InnoDB目前支持一次创建一个FULLTEXT索引。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB records the status of background encryption operations in the INNODB_TABLESPACES_ENCRYPTION table in the information_schema database.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB 在 information_schema 数据库的 INNODB_TABLESPACES_ENCRYPTION 表中记录后台加密操作的状态。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB status for high-level performance monitoring.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB状态用于高级性能监控。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB storage engine and XtraDB, its performance-enhanced fork made by Percona.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB存储引擎和XtraDB,它是Percona制造的性能增强型分叉。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB strict mode can be enabled or disabled by configuring the innodb_strict_mode server system variable.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过配置 innodb_strict_mode 服务器系统变量来启用或禁用InnoDB严格模式。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB subsystem. See below for the matching module to use to enable/disable monitoring this subsytem with the innodb_monitor_enable and innodb_monitor_disable system variables.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB子系统。有关使用innodb_monitor_enable和innodb_monitor_disable系统变量来启用/禁用监视此子系统的匹配模块，请参见下文。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports a number of lock modes to ensure that concurrent write operations never collide.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持多种锁模式,以确保并发的写操作不会发生碰撞。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding a FULLTEXT index to a table with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE. The table is not rebuilt in some cases.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 FULLTEXT 索引添加到 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的表中。在某些情况下，不会重建该表。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding a FULLTEXT index to a table with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持在将 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的表中添加 FULLTEXT 索引。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding a SPATIAL index to a table with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的表中添加 SPATIAL 索引。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding a SPATIAL index to a table with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持在将 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的表中添加 SPATIAL 索引。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding a new ENUM option to a column with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE. In order to add a new ENUM option with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE, the following requirements must be met:
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将新的 ENUM 选项添加到 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的列。为了添加新的 ENUM 选项并将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE ，必须满足以下要求：

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding a new ENUM option to a column with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT. In order to add a new ENUM option with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT, the following requirements must be met:
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将新的 ENUM 选项添加到 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的列。为了添加新的 ENUM 选项并将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT ，必须满足以下要求：

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding a new ENUM option to a column with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT ，则InnoDB支持将新的 ENUM 选项添加到 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的列。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding a new SET option to a column with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE. In order to add a new SET option with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE, the following requirements must be met:
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将新的 SET 选项添加到 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的列。为了将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 来添加新的 SET 选项，必须满足以下要求：

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding a new SET option to a column with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT. In order to add a new SET option with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT, the following requirements must be met:
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将新的 SET 选项添加到 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的列。为了添加新的 SET 选项并将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT ，必须满足以下要求：

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding a new SET option to a column with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 在操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT 的情况下，InnoDB支持将新的 SET 选项添加到 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的列。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding a plain index to a table with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE. The table is not rebuilt.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的表添加纯索引。该表未重建。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding a plain index to a table with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的普通索引添加到表中。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding a primary key to a table with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持在 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的情况下向表添加主键。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding columns to a table with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持在 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的情况下向表中添加列。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports adding foreign key constraints to a table with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE. In order to add a new foreign key constraint to a table with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE, the foreign_key_checks system variable needs to be set to OFF. If it is set to ON, then ALGORITHM=COPY is required.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将外键约束添加到 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的表。为了向 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的表添加新的外键约束，需要将 foreign_key_checks 系统变量设置为 OFF 。如果将其设置为 ON ，则需要 ALGORITHM=COPY 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports changing a table's row format with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持修改表的行格式与 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports changing a table's AUTO_INCREMENT value with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE. This operation should finish instantly. The table is not rebuilt.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持在 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的情况下更改表的 AUTO_INCREMENT 值。此操作应立即完成。该表未重建。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports changing a table's AUTO_INCREMENT value with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 来更改表的 AUTO_INCREMENT 值。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports changing a table's AUTO_INCREMENT value with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 在操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT 的情况下，InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的情况下更改表的 AUTO_INCREMENT 值。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports changing a table's KEY_BLOCK_SIZE with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持更改表的 KEY_BLOCK_SIZE 与 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports dropping system versioning from a table with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持从 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的表中删除系统版本控制。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports dropping columns from a table with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持从 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的表中删除列。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports dropping foreign key constraints from a table with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持从 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的表中删除外键约束。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports dropping foreign key constraints from a table with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持从 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的表中删除外键约束。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports dropping foreign key constraints from a table with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 在操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT 的情况下，InnoDB支持从将 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的表中删除外键约束。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports dropping indexes from a table with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持从 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的表中删除索引。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports dropping indexes from a table with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持从 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的表中删除索引。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports dropping indexes from a table with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT ，则InnoDB支持从将 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的表中删除索引。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports each of the translation isolation levels described here using different locking strategies. The default level is REPEATABLE READ. For additional information about InnoDB record-level locks and how it uses them to execute various types of statements, see XtraDB/InnoDB Lock Modes, and http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/en/innodb-locks-set.html.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB使用不同的锁定策略支持此处描述的每个转换隔离级别。默认级别为 REPEATABLE READ 。有关InnoDB记录级锁及其如何使用它们执行各种类型的语句的更多信息，请参见XtraDB / InnoDB Lock Modes和http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/en/innodb-locks-set .html。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports forcing a table rebuild with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 来强制重建表。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports increasing the length of VARCHAR columns with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT, unless it would require changing the number of bytes requires to represent the column's length. A VARCHAR column that is between 0 and 255 bytes in size requires 1 byte to represent its length, while a VARCHAR column that is 256 bytes or longer requires 2 bytes to represent its length. This means that the length of a column cannot be increased with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT if the original length was less than 256 bytes, and the new length is 256 bytes or more.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 来增加 VARCHAR 列的长度，除非需要更改表示列长度的字节数。甲 VARCHAR 列，它是在大小0到255字节之间需要1个字节来表示其长度，而 VARCHAR 列，它是256个字节或更长需要2个字节来表示其长度。这意味着如果原始长度小于256个字节，而新长度为256个字节或更多，则在 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的情况下无法增加列的长度。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports modifying a column to not allow NULL values with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE. It is required for strict mode to be enabled in SQL_MODE. The operation will fail if the column contains any NULL values. Changes that would interfere with referential integrity are also not permitted.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持修改列不允许 NULL 与值 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 。在 SQL_MODE 中启用严格模式是必需的。如果该列包含任何 NULL 值，则该操作将失败。也不允许进行会影响参照完整性的更改。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports modifying a column to allow NULL values with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持修改列以允许将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的 NULL 值。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports modifying a column's DEFAULT value with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 来修改列的 DEFAULT 值。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports modifying a column's DEFAULT value with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 来修改列的 DEFAULT 值。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports modifying a column's DEFAULT value with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 在操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT 的情况下，InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 来修改列的 DEFAULT 值。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports optimizing a table with with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 来优化表。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports removing a column's DEFAULT value with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持在 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的情况下删除列的 DEFAULT 值。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports removing a column's DEFAULT value with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持在 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的情况下删除列的 DEFAULT 值。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports removing a column's DEFAULT value with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT ，则InnoDB支持在 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的情况下删除列的 DEFAULT 值。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports renaming a column with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE, unless the column's data type or attributes changed in addition to the name.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的列重命名，除非该列的数据类型或属性除名称外有所更改。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports renaming a column with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT, unless the column's data type or attributes changed in addition to the name.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的列重命名，除非该列的数据类型或属性除名称外有所更改。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports renaming a column with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT ，则InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的列重命名。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports renaming a table with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的表重命名。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports renaming a table with ALGORITHM set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INSTANT 的表重命名。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports renaming a table with ALGORITHM set to NOCOPY in the cases where the operation supports having the ALGORITHM clause set to INSTANT.
trans-unit.target: 在操作支持将 ALGORITHM 子句设置为 INSTANT 的情况下，InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 NOCOPY 的表重命名。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports reordering columns within a table with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的表中的列重新排序。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB supports the SQL statements SAVEPOINT, ROLLBACK TO SAVEPOINT, RELEASE SAVEPOINT and the optional WORK keyword for ROLLBACK.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB支持SQL语句 SAVEPOINT ， ROLLBACK TO SAVEPOINT ， RELEASE SAVEPOINT 以及 ROLLBACK 的可选 WORK 关键字。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB system tablespace
trans-unit.target: InnoDB系统表空间

trans-unit.source: InnoDB table information.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB表信息。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB table space id number.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB表空间id号。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB tables can have a maximum of 1,017 columns. This includes virtual generated columns.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB表最多可包含1,017列。这包括虚拟生成的列。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB tables can have a maximum of 64 secondary indexes.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB表最多可以有64个二级索引。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB tables support online DDL in certain circumstances.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB表在某些情况下支持在线DDL。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB tables support online DDL, which permits concurrent DML and uses optimizations to avoid unnecessary table copying.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB表支持在线DDL,它允许并发DML,并使用优化来避免不必要的表复制。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB tables that are part of the system tablespace can only be encrypted using the encryption key set by the innodb_default_encryption_key_id system variable.
trans-unit.target: 只能使用由 innodb_default_encryption_key_id 系统变量设置的加密密钥来加密属于系统表空间的InnoDB表。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB tablespace ID.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB表空间ID。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB tablespace information.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB表空间信息。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB tablespace paths.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB表空间路径。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB used the wrong calculations to determine row sizes for quite a long time, so a lot of users may unknowingly have unsafe tables that the InnoDB row format can't actually store.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB在很长一段时间内一直使用错误的计算来确定行大小，因此许多用户可能在不知不觉中拥有InnoDB行格式无法实际存储的不安全表。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB uses encryption key management plugins to support the use of multiple encryption keys.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB使用加密密钥管理插件来支持多个加密密钥的使用。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB uses encryption key management plugins to support the use of multiple encryption keys.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB使用加密密钥管理插件,支持使用多个加密密钥。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB uses the Redo Log in crash recovery. By default, these events are written to file in an unencrypted state. In configuring MariaDB for data-at-rest encryption, ensure that you also enable encryption for the Redo Log.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB使用重做登录崩溃恢复。默认情况下，这些事件以未加密状态写入文件。在配置MariaDB以进行静态数据加密时，请确保还为重做日志启用加密。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB uses the Redo Log in crash recovery. By default, these events are written to file in an unencrypted state. In removing data-at-rest encryption for InnoDB, be sure to also disable encryption for the Redo Log before removing encryption key settings. Otherwise the Redo Log can become inaccessible without the encryption keys.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB使用重做登录崩溃恢复。默认情况下，这些事件以未加密状态写入文件。在删除InnoDB的静态数据加密时，请确保在删除加密密钥设置之前也对重做日志禁用加密。否则，如果没有加密密钥，重做日志将变得不可访问。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB uses the buffer pool, which stores data and indexes from its tables in memory. This buffer is very important for performance. If InnoDB data doesn't fit the memory, it is important that the buffer contains the most frequently accessed data. However, last accessed data is candidate for insertion into the buffer pool. If not properly configured, when a table scan happens, InnoDB may copy the whole contents of a table into the buffer pool. The problem with logical backups is that they always imply full table scans.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB使用缓冲池，该缓冲池将其表中的数据和索引存储在内存中。此缓冲区对于性能非常重要。如果InnoDB数据不适合内存，则缓冲区包含最常访问的数据非常重要。但是，最后访问的数据是插入缓冲池的候选对象。如果配置不正确，则在进行表扫描时，InnoDB可能会将表的全部内容复制到缓冲池中。逻辑备份的问题在于它们始终暗含全表扫描。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB versions in MySQL 5.7 and above also support an additional type of tablespace called general tablespaces that are created with CREATE TABLESPACE. However, InnoDB versions in MariaDB Server do not currently support general tablespaces or CREATE TABLESPACE.
trans-unit.target: MySQL 5.7及更高版本中的InnoDB版本还支持使用 CREATE TABLESPACE 创建的另一种类型的表空间，称为常规表空间。但是，MariaDB Server中的InnoDB版本当前不支持常规表空间或 CREATE TABLESPACE 。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB's buffer_pool With multi-core boxes, the mutex problem is causing performance problems. In general, past 4-8 cores, MySQL gets slower, not faster. MySQL 5.5 and Percona's XtraDB made that somewhat better in InnoDB; the practical limit for cores is more like 32, and performance tends plateaus after that rather than declining. 5.6 claims to scale up to about 48 cores.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的buffer_pool 在多核盒子的情况下,mutex的问题导致了性能问题。一般来说,过了4-8核,MySQL会变慢,而不是变快。MySQL 5.5和Percona的XtraDB在InnoDB中使这一点得到了一定程度的改善;核心的实际极限更像是32个,之后性能趋于平缓,而不是下降。5.6号称可以扩展到48核左右。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB's file-per-table tablespaces are transportable, which means that you can copy a file-per-table tablespace from one MariaDB Server to another server. See Copying Transportable Tablespaces for more information.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的每表文件表空间是可移动的，这意味着您可以将每表文件的表空间从一个MariaDB服务器复制到另一台服务器。有关更多信息，请参见复制可移动表空间。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB's file-per-table tablespaces are transportable, which means that you can copy a file-per-table tablespace from one MariaDB Server to another server. You may find this useful in cases where you need to transport full tables between servers and don't want to use backup tools like mariabackup or mysqldump. In fact, this process can even be used with mariabackup in some cases, such as when restoring partial backups or when restoring individual tables or partitions from a backup.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的每表文件表空间是可移动的，这意味着您可以将每表文件的表空间从一个MariaDB服务器复制到另一台服务器。在需要在服务器之间传输完整表并且不想使用 mariabackup 或 mysqldump 等备份工具的情况下，这可能会很有用。实际上，在某些情况下，甚至可以与 mariabackup 一起使用此过程，例如，还原部分备份或从备份还原单个表或分区时。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB's multi-thread flush feature can be enabled by setting the innodb_use_mtflush system variable. The number of threads cane be configured by setting the innodb_mtflush_threads system variable. This system variable can be set in a server option group in an option file prior to starting up the server. For example:
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置 innodb_use_mtflush 系统变量来启用InnoDB的多线程刷新功能。可以通过设置 innodb_mtflush_threads 系统变量来配置线程数。在启动服务器之前，可以在选项文件的服务器选项组中设置此系统变量。例如：

trans-unit.source: InnoDB's multi-thread flush feature was deprecated in MariaDB 10.2.9 and removed from MariaDB 10.3.2. In later versions of MariaDB, use innodb_page_cleaners system variable instead.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的多线程刷新功能已在MariaDB 10.2.9中弃用，并已从MariaDB 10.3.2中删除。在更高版本的MariaDB中，请改用 innodb_page_cleaners 系统变量。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB's multi-thread flush feature was deprecated in MariaDB 10.2.9 and removed from MariaDB 10.3.2. In later versions of MariaDB, use multiple InnoDB page cleaner threads instead.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的多线程刷新功能已在MariaDB 10.2.9中弃用，并已从MariaDB 10.3.2中删除。在更高版本的MariaDB中，请改用多个InnoDB页面清洁程序线程。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB's multi-thread flush feature was first added in MariaDB 10.1.0. It was deprecated in MariaDB 10.2.9 and removed in MariaDB 10.3.2.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的多线程刷新功能首先在MariaDB 10.1.0中添加。它在MariaDB 10.2.9中已弃用，在MariaDB 10.3.2中已删除。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB's row formats are REDUNDANT, COMPACT, DYNAMIC, and COMPRESSED.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的行格式有REDUNDANT、COMPACT、DYNAMIC和COMPRESSED。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB's row formats work around this limit by storing certain kinds of variable-length columns on overflow pages. However, different row formats can store different types of data on overflow pages. Some row formats can store more data in overflow pages than others. For example, the DYNAMIC and COMPRESSED row formats can store the most data in overflow pages. To learn how the various InnoDB row formats use overflow pages, see the following pages:
trans-unit.target: InnoDB的行格式通过在溢出页面上存储某些类型的可变长度列来解决此限制。但是，不同的行格式可以在溢出页面上存储不同类型的数据。某些行格式可以比其他行格式在溢出页面中存储更多数据。例如， DYNAMIC 和 COMPRESSED 行格式可以在溢出页面中存储最多的数据。要了解各种InnoDB行格式如何使用溢出页面，请参阅以下页面：

trans-unit.source: InnoDB, even with innodb_file_per_table = 1, won't give space back to the OS, but at least it is only one table to rebuild with. In this case, something like this should work:
trans-unit.target: InnoDB,即使 innodb_file_per_table=1,也不会把空间还给操作系统,但至少只有一张表可以重建。在这种情况下,类似这样的做法应该是可行的。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB/XtraDB supports row-level locking. selected rows can be locked using LOCK IN SHARE MODE or FOR UPDATE. In both cases, a lock is acquired on the rows read by the query, and it will be released when the current transaction is committed.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB / XtraDB支持行级锁定。可以使用 LOCK IN SHARE MODE 或 FOR UPDATE 锁定选定的行。在这两种情况下，都会在查询读取的行上获得一个锁，并且在提交当前事务时将释放该锁。
